titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain manufacturing equipment used for working iron or steel.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain manufacturing equipment used for working iron or steel.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2009, of the duty on certain manufacturing equipment used for working iron or steel.
